title: Cluster Statistics
content:
The indicator allows getting full information about the structure of each bar.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Rows

NameDescription
Show asks Determines whether to display information about ask volumes.
Show bids Determines whether to display information about bid volumes.
Delta Determines whether to display information about delta.
Show Delta/Volume Determines whether to display information about delta per volume.
Session delta Determines whether to display information about session delta.
Session delta/volume Determines whether to display information about session delta per volume.
Maximum delta Determines whether to display information about maximum delta.
Minimum delta Determines whether to display information about minimum delta.
Delta change Determines whether to display information about the difference between the delta of the current candle and the delta of the previous one.
Volume Determines whether to display volume information.
Volume/second Determines whether to display information about volume per second.
Session volume Determines whether to display cumulative volume information within a session.
Trades count Determines whether to display information about the number of trades.
Height Determines whether to display information about the height of the candle (in currency).
Time Determines whether to display information about the start time of the candle.
Show duration, sec Determines whether to display information about the time duration of the candle.

Visualization

NameDescription
Background Sets the background color of the label.
Transparency
Grid Defines the color of the grid.
Proportion by visible part of the chart If enabled, proportions are determined within the visible part of the chart, otherwise within the entire chart.
Volume Sets the color of the volume element.
Ask Color Sets the color of the ask element.
Bid Color Sets the color of the bid element.

Text

NameDescription
Color Sets the color of the label text.
Font Specifies various settings for the font.
Center align If enabled, aligns text to the center.

Headers

NameDescription
Color Sets the color of the header background.
Hide headers If enabled, hides header lines.

Volume alert

NameDescription
Enabled This setting enables alert notifications for specific conditions or events as defined by the indicator. When activated, the indicator will send an alert.
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.

Delta alert

NameDescription
Enabled This setting enables alert notifications for specific conditions or events as defined by the indicator. When activated, the indicator will send an alert.
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.
